page.title: 05AGRICULTURAL CONTRACTOR
page.content: The family shop in Taunton which is six miles from their home.There are regular deliveries of bread and milk.The paper man comes at 4.30 A.M..There are not many activites in Broomfield since most of the activites are in Enmore.There are riding stables,a Post Office,sweet and cigarette shop and a pub.There is also a telephone box.Many people have moved from the area,but several new people have moved in.The family have lived there for four generations.The father,as an agricultural contractor,does combining and ploughing.He also does drilling and bulldozes the hedges to make more land.He has an assistant and he has been contracting for forty two years. Mostly small farmers hire him.Not many farmers live in Broomfield.They have mains water,gas and electricity.
